extendedInfo.description: The Planet has been INVADED! The Worldâs Military enslaved by an Alien Mind Control Device! Only ONE Battle Squad remains.Shielded in their underground bunkers, our heroes emerge into a Fight for Survival. The Invaders must be stopped at all costs!âââ Command armies of - Tanks- Infantry- Helicopters- Trikes- Deploy Turrets- Explosive Barrels- Landmines - And many more to defeat the enemy!Using the unique strengths of each unit, combine battlefield tactics and decisive action to outsmart and conquer the invaders!Lightweight fast units for carrying out lightning raids, slow powerful siege tanks for bombarding enemy positions, battle tanks and infantry squads for intense warfare: choose the right units for the job and command them in battle. âââ Thereâs a huge variety of missions in the first Defense Command mission pack and with many more mission packs in development, the replay value of this game is going to be massive!Each mission is designed to bring you the best gameplay experience from playing Defense Command and will challenge you to combine strategy and action in different ways.Play a fast 2 minute mission or take on the entire might of the enemy onslaught and take back the Planet!âââ Download Defense Command now and if you like what you see, our constantly evolving series of mission packs will keep you hooked!

reviews.title: Meh, could be awesome.
reviews.comment: Unable to see or scroll to edges of map, playing on Google nexus 7 with android 4.2.2 please fix, if you add the ability to set rally points and fix screen issue I would give it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Brian Wargo

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: I had been looking for a game like this for a while. It\'s still not what I got used to on the PC, 10 years ago, but it is refreshing.
reviews.author: Faissal aka Md. Faisal Halim

reviews.title: Pants
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money. Nothing like c&c like some people have said. Some of the levels are impossible as you are attacked before you even get a chance to do anything about. Very poor. I\'ll stick to c&c.
reviews.author: Lewis D\'ambrosio

reviews.title: Dev
reviews.comment: Perfect just have better sound and make skirmishs easier... like the enemy starts out with a few units like you
reviews.author: Slim Harbor

reviews.title: Full of glitches
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time or money
reviews.author: Jeb Baker

reviews.title: Downloaded
reviews.comment: We\'ll see lol... Errr...at first it\'s good. I\'ve played already 3 maps and that was fun. My phone is not hot so its Ok. Graphic could be better but enough 2 enjoy. Sound is the same. If u like C&C than this game deserves a try. \302\2432 is not that bad. I\'ve spent \302\2432.70 for a burger today lol I\'m not hungry and I have time to play so...By
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Crappy touch calibration. It took me 4-5 attempts to select multiple troops.  I would have asked for refund, but was too late.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never let\'s me finish! Force closes
reviews.comment: Every time I\'m playing I get about 10 minutes in and it just shuts me out it goes to my home screen and I have to completely restart! I love this game but I hate that I can never finish a map! Please fix and I\'ll give it 5 stars
reviews.author: Jesse Barksdale

reviews.title: Kombat Strike
reviews.comment: If you like total annaliation or c&c you must play, need more maps and vehicals, navy, air

reviews.comment: But not as good as rusted warfare or Genesis!
